question: Antonio Guterres is the Secretary General of which global organisation?
explanation:
Antonio Guterres, a Portuguese diplomat, is the ninth Secretary General of the United Nations (UN). His current term which started in the year 2017 is to expire this year.
Antonio Guterres announced that he is seeking a second term. Recently, the United Nations commenced the selection of its next Secretary-general by asking all its 193 members to submit their candidature.
